reviews.text: We did not pay to have the sea view but who needed it as the sea is right in front of the hotel :)

reviews.title: A place to chill out
reviews.text: I really have to say, i love this hotel, the very friendly and helpful staff and the great fiew over the atlantic (especially at sunset time).
